articles.title: China's Israel envoy compares virus travel bans to Holocaust
articles.description: JERUSALEM (AP) — China's acting ambassador to Israel apologized on Sunday after comparing the closure of several national borders to Chinese citizens amid fears of a new virus from China to the turning away of Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

articles.title: Tokyo cuts ribbon on another Olympic venue -- Ariake Arena
articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — Tokyo cut the ribbon on another new Olympic venue on Sunday, just under six months ahead of the games' opening.
